Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccListener Class Reference

DccListener listens for incoming DCC requests on any Connection in which DCC is enabled. This class follows the singleton pattern and there so there is only a single instance which listens to all connections. More...

Events

DccChatRequestEventHandler OnDccChatRequest
 A user from any Connection has sent a request to open a DCC chat session.
DccSendRequestEventHandler OnDccSendRequest
 A remote user has sent a request to send a file.
DccGetRequestEventHandler OnDccGetRequest
 A remote user requests that he be sent a file.

Detailed Description

DccListener listens for incoming DCC requests on any Connection in which DCC is enabled. This class follows the singleton pattern and there so there is only a single instance which listens to all connections.

Member Function Documentation

Test if the message contains a DCC request.

Parameters:
message The raw message from the IRC server
Returns:
